title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models, list running models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API; simple interface for chat & completion.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper around Ollama with REPL, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama with GPU & CPU variants; one-line local LLM server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot template wired to Ollama; great starter for local AI apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into channels; supports slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to chat with local Ollama models; private DMs or channel mentions.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript package on npm; zero dependencies, ESM & CommonJS.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official Ollama Python package on PyPI; supports generate, chat, embed, list, pull.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM & embedding integrations for Ollama; RAG with local models.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama ecosystem discussions, model tips, and community projects.
